My daddy knows some mercenaries that can give you a real flank-whooping.
Don't come near me.
Or you'll regret it.

And don't even bother with those blank flanks either! Only I can do nasty and horrible things to them!

Oh relax, he's not dead, but rather tied up nice and snug.

Now...where were we?
